text: Birthday Song may refer to: *birthday song *List of birthday songs ==Songs== *Birthday Song (2 Chainz song), Kanye West 2012 *"Birthday Song", song by Don McLean, McLean 1975, And I Love You So (Don McLean album), covered Mike Douglas 1974 *"Birthday Song", song by Kim Wilde, Ricki Wilde, Kim Wilde 1992 *"Birthday Song", song by Matthew Ellis (British musician), Ellis 1971
